channel.title: Claws special ? vote?
channel.description:
hey guys,
Does any1 knows how i can change this nub claw spec:
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2hp7qya.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2bqhzo.jpg[/img]
into this claw spec:
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/22dncj.png[/img]
and how i can add a ::vote command ?

item.title: Claws special ? vote?
item.dc:creator: @Pluvia Pluvia
item.description:
@Pluvia wrote:

Thewre is tut on this somewere i think iit’s by deathcaos but idk =/ For the ::vote command it all depends on what you mean, like what do you want it to do?

[quote=“unlimitedx”]hi with the ::vote command i mean:
popping up my google pages or another vote page i gonna make soon…
do you know where i can add?[/quote]
You will have to add the command in the client (not in your source files your actrual client) then you will have to make the ::vote command to work with the client. IDK if you have ever worked with a 317 were the ::noclip command works but it is in the client itself and not in the source. So you won’t have to mess with the source but in the client folders I am not sure how to do all that in the 508+ so yur a little out of luck with me.

Read full topic
